sentences.english: A loyal &lovely husband who respects, cherishes &spoils me;
sentences.chinese: 一位忠誠可愛的丈夫，時刻把我嬌寵慣愛及尊重。

sentences.english: What you have to do is go on spoiling her.
sentences.chinese: 你要做的就是繼續嬌寵她。

sentences.english: Michael's wife, Fleur , had been spoiled by her father .
sentences.chinese: 邁克爾的妻子弗勒被她的父親嬌寵壞了。
